::: Inferno, Marine, and Rampage had been hiding behinde several crates and 
over turned tables for the past 20 minutes. The internal defences couldnt see 
them behinde the makeshift foxhole, and for now they were safe. :::

::: Inferno, coverend in numerous blast marks. ::: The Royalty will be very 
displeased!

::: Rampage, also covered in marks by the crossfire, and with a splitting 
headache. ::: Who cares anymore? We just need to blow this bridge apart!

::: Marine smiled ::: Good thinking!

::: He went to his left forearm and opened a small compartment. He took out 
two explosives, clicked them together, and threw them over head onto the main 
floor of the bridge. After a brief countdown, they exploded sending the three 
Predacon slamming agianst the wall, and destroying mose of the computers and 
defences in that room. :::

::: Rampage, now black with sutt and in pain ::: That was my good thinking? I 
wouldnt have done that!

::: Marine ::: well, at least now we can move around the bridge without the 
autodefences shooting us.

::: Rampge sniffed. The three got up coutiously and began to move around the 
broken room. Marine was wrong, all the computers were destroyed. They couldnt 
even find all the pieces to put one back together. :::

::: Inferno ::: Ah, the Royalty will be pleased after all. 

::: Marine ::: Well, one things for sure, they wont be using this bridge ever 
agian.

::: The three Predacons lauged, and then groaned with the pain they had 
caused themselfs in the explosion. :::

::: Marine, on comm to Hell Beast ::: Commander, success! We have completely 
destroyed the Maximal bridge!

::: Hell Beast ::: Excellent! And what of the Maximals and defense systems?

::: Marine ::: Well, we really havent encountered any Maximals, and most of 
the defences are down.

::: Hell Beast ::: Good, good. I want a full report in an hour about your 
progress. Hell Beast out.

::: The comm went to static. :::
